attributes.action: David Camron to put pressure on Japanese Embassey over Continued Whale and Dolphin Slaughter
attributes.additional_details:
I would like Britain to take a firm Stance  against the Japanese Embassy To Say Enough is Enough over Japans Continuing Whaling And Cetacen slaughter. Im really Concerned Britain is not taking firmer Action to End the World Wide Slaughter of Cetacens.
A Whole Marine ECO SYSTEM is at risk
